alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 06 at 9:02PM MDT until October 07 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility under one quarter mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County, South Laramie Range Foothills and Central Laramie County. This includes Interstate 25 between the Colorado/Wyoming border and Wheatland. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; South Laramie Range Foothills
